title: Update header logo static asset to match uploaded logo

requirements.summary: Replace the site header logo by updating the existing generated static asset file so the header keeps the same image path while displaying the newly uploaded logo.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png` is updated to visually match the uploaded `download-1.webp` logo and is web-optimized.
The header logo displayed by `frontend/src/components/site/SiteHeader.tsx` renders the updated logo without layout issues on mobile and desktop.
No other routes/components require changes to reference the header logo (path remains `/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png`).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing PNG artwork with a web-optimized PNG version of the uploaded logo (`download-1.webp`), centered on a clean 800x300 canvas to match the existing filename and dimensions so all existing references continue to work.

Verify the header logo remains pointed to `/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png` and adjust only non-breaking rendering attributes (e.g., explicit width/height, decoding/loading hints, or responsive class tweaks) if needed to prevent layout shift and ensure the new logo fits well on mobile and desktop.
